attributes.action: Instigate the process to strip MPs of their knighthood if they have abused their parliamentary expense accounts whether or not "they acted within the rules"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We feel that MPs carrying the title "Sir" who have claimed for ridiculous expenses such as helipads and gardening bills which their salaries would easily cover have not behaved in a "kinghtly" way and do not deserve to keep their titles. The Queen's website describes a knighthood as something that "recognises significant contributions to national life." In the current economic crisis using taxpayer's money for these expenses does not contribute to national life it hinders it.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
